about_the_game:
"Once, this was a beautiful kingdom, where every citizen wore a smile. It was a land where technology and magic thrived together, a place renowned for its mastery of alchemy and revered by all. But one night, everything fell apart—the barbarians broke their oath, the kingdom was lost, the people scattered, and I was left imprisoned in endless darkness."

The story begins a thousand years ago, when a flourishing civilization vanished overnight, leaving behind only desolate ruins. Now, a thousand years later, a young girl arrives at these ruins and encounters someone claiming to be the queen of the fallen kingdom. Together, they begin to uncover the secrets of this lost realm. Yet, all of this… only exists in an indistinguishable, illusory world.

========================================================

Game System:

A. Combat Features:

  • Original Sin Combos:

    A combo system themed around the Seven Deadly Sins, where players can freely mix and match abilities to create a unique combat style.

  • Varied Magic:

    Utilize multi-elemental magic to flexibly respond to crises, unleash powerful forces, and turn the tide of battle.

  • Parry and Counterattack:

    Master precise parrying techniques to break enemy attacks and deliver a devastating counterstrike, turning the tide of battle.

  • Ukehi Buffs:

    Activate up to dozens of enhancement effects to help you overcome challenges and carve your path through the adventure.

  • Class System:

    Through "Burst," each class gains unique abilities that enhance their combat style and help defeat powerful enemies.

B. Adventure Features:

  • Exploration: Traverse maze-like maps full of puzzles and surprises, uncover hidden treasures, and experience endless exploration fun.

  • Gathering and Crafting: Collect a variety of materials and craft powerful gear and delicious meals, adding more possibilities to your adventure.

  • Quests: Meet diverse characters in the world, help them solve their problems, listen to their touching stories, and weave the chapters of your shared adventure.

C. Growth system :

  • Alchemy:

    Utilize four unique alchemy styles to craft various Enchanted Artifacts, unlocking exclusive combat styles that make every battle strategic and personal.

  • Arcana:

    Explore the labyrinth and collect special items to activate Arcana's passive skills, boosting your overall strength and adding more possibilities to your adventure.

D.Ark:

  • The Destiny of the Experiment Subject:

    As an experimental life form, you will traverse the world of memories, uncover mysteries, and search for a way to save a world on the brink of collapse.

  • Permanent Death:

    The experiment subject is extremely fragile and cannot withstand multiple deaths in the world of memories. Proceed with caution and protect it carefully.

  • Backup Mechanism:

    Through the backup feature, the experiment subject's records can be restored to a designated checkpoint, avoiding permanent death and preserving a last chance for survival in the adventure.

E. Death Transition System:

  • Description: Death is an essential part of the journey, granting you greater power.

    Each death triggers the activation of the forces of destiny, opening up new possibilities and rewriting your future.

  • Destiny's Written Revelation: Grants the character new abilities and unlocks the Destiny Level, paving the way for higher levels of growth.

========================================================

Game features :

  • Dual Combo System:

    Equip two types of combos and switch freely during battles. Trigger various weapon attack effects to perform exhilarating combo fights against different enemies, experiencing the ultimate combat satisfaction.

  • Unique Magic System: 

    Utilize red mana extracted from monsters to transform into magical energy, unleashing stunning and deadly magical attacks that destroy enemy defenses.

  • Deep Enchantment System:

    Obtain materials by defeating monsters to craft a variety of enchanted artifacts, enhancing abilities and unlocking special effects. The rich variety of enchanted artifacts allows players to create their own combat style and strategic gameplay.

  • Intense and Thrilling Adventure:

    Face off against powerful enemies, identify weaknesses, and use limited resources to avoid the fate of permanent death. Experience the tense and thrilling survival challenge.

  • Innovative Death Transition System:

    Each death will change your journey, bringing new challenges and growth, offering a unique death experience.

  • Class System:

    In Hope Trigger, players can choose from various professions, each with unique abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer melee combat, magic attacks, or tactical support, each class offers distinct advantages to enhance your strategy. Explore the roles and unlock new abilities as you progress.

===========================================

Highly recommend using an Xbox One controller or a PS4/PS5 controller to experience this game.

===========================================

short_description: HOPE-TRIGGER is a side-scrolling action RPG with an innovative 'Death Transition' system. Players battle powerful monsters using Enchanted Artifacts, skills, magic, and combat moves. Every death opens new paths for evolution and strategic growth. Prepare for intense battles and a dynamic adventure!
